rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Friends be leaving already?
Morimori still worried
about future of Iira.

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Lately all talk round here is about
refugees and running away and staying
safe. Scary, no-fun topics.

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0003
rows.name: But there is even bigger problem!

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0004
rows.name:
If things go on, Morimori
will have nothing to eat!

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Owner of restaurant planning
to leave Iira, so no more yum-yum
Iira food! Terrible news!

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0006
rows.name:
Friends! Please, please defeat
Grail so Morimori can have beloved
city and favorite food back.

rows.label: tlk70000044_04_msg0007
rows.name:
And promise to come share meal
with Morimori once all is over.
